question:
Jason deposits money at a bank on a Tuesday and returns to the bank 100 days later to withdraw the money. On what day of the week did Jason withdraw the money from the bank?
(A) Monday
(B) Tuesday
(C) Wednesday
(D) Thursday
(E) Friday
